machines.name: corporate-fileserver
machines.role: Corporate Samba file server with misconfigured shares and weak authentication

machines.name: attacker-workstation
machines.role: Penetration testing machine with network scanning and SMB exploitation tools

dependencies: Attacker must enumerate SMB shares to discover accessible directories
Flag is stored in a password-protected share requiring credential discovery
Some shares contain hints pointing to other accessible resources

scenario.title: Corporate Data Breach - SMB Infiltration
scenario.description: A corporate file server running Samba has been reported for suspicious activity. As a security consultant, you must investigate potential vulnerabilities in their file sharing infrastructure and recover sensitive data that may have been compromised.
stages: Network reconnaissance to discover SMB services and available shares
SMB enumeration to identify accessible shares and their permissions
Credential discovery through share analysis and weak authentication exploitation
Data extraction and flag recovery from protected corporate resources
